description: Trigger-focused evaluation queries designed to activate Phase 1 augmentation

queries.query: What are the requirements for patent eligibility under Alice 101 and written description under 112(a)?
When is a software claim both abstract under 101 and lacking enablement under 112?
How does obviousness analysis differ from written description requirements for genus claims?
What is the Therasense materiality standard for inequitable conduct?
How does the doctrine of equivalents apply to prosecution history estoppel after Festo?
What is the Williamson v. Citrix test for means-plus-function claim construction?
Does KSR or Graham provide the correct framework for motivation to combine references?
When Alice conflicts with Bilski on abstract idea determination, which controls?
What amount of experimentation is undue under the Wands factors for biological claims?
How do courts apply the full scope of enablement requirement to genus claims covering thousands of species?
After KSR, what evidence rebuts a prima facie case of obviousness for combining prior art references?
When can an examiner combine three or more prior art references to reject claims as obvious under 103?
